gw.api.rest

Class Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.rest.Response

  • public class Response
extends java.lang.Object
    The Response class represents the data that will be sent back as the response to an HTTP request, including the body of the response (if any), the MediaType of that data, the HTTP status code, and any headers that should be included.

    This class is intended to be familiar to developers that are familiar with the JAX-RS Response object API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Response.ResponseBuilder
      This class is a builder for Response, its build method will return a Response

      • fromResponse

        public static Response.ResponseBuilder fromResponse(Response response)

        Parameters:
        response - the Response to copy
        Returns:
        a builder initialized with that Response's data

      • ok

        public static Response.ResponseBuilder ok(java.lang.Object entity)

        Parameters:
        entity - the entity contents
        Returns:
        a builder

      • ok

        public static Response.ResponseBuilder ok(java.lang.Object entity,
                                          java.lang.String type)

        Parameters:

        type - the type of the entity
        Returns:
        a builder
